review: Visited this dental clinic for root treatment and It was a smooth procedure. she was patient enough to listen all my explanation and good in explaining about the treatment plan. The price is also reasonable. I strongly recommend her clinic for all the dental issues

Went for general checkup , found out my teeth needed filling and cleaning. The doctor made sure I had a pain free process , assisted me patiently and very professionally. I would highly recommend her to everyone.

I visited the Happy Curve dental clinic to clean my teeth. The doctor is very friendly and patiently cleared all my doubts. During the entire process she made me feel very comfortable and I didn't feel any pain or sensitivity  throughout the procedure. And the place is very clean and hygienic.
reply_text:
Thank you for taking your valuable time to review us. It means a lot to us.We are happy that we are able to meet your expectation. Have a healthy and happy smile.
Regards
Dr.S.Sathiya Priya

review: Had a wonderful experience at happy curve , Dr. Sathiya Priya was very careful and patient throughout the cleaning process . Very hygienic work environment. Would highly recommend everyone to go and check out the place for all your dental problems.
